name: fission yeast phenotype condition
fission yeast phenotype condition
FYECO:0000001.def: Any aspect of an experiment that the experimenter controls and that does not depend on which strain/organism/cells are used.

name: temperature
temperature
FYECO:0000002.def: Any experimental condition specifying the temperature at which the experiment was performed.

name: expression level
expression level
FYECO:0000003.def: The expression level of the gene was altered in the experiment, compared to expressing the gene from the genome and its endogenous promoter.

name: high temperature
high temperature
FYECO:0000004.def: The experiment was performed, or cells were grown, at a high temperature (typically exceeding ~32 degrees Celsius).

name: standard temperature
standard temperature
FYECO:0000005.def: The experiment was performed, or cells were grown in a temperature typically in the range between 25+32 degrees Celsius.

name: low temperature
low temperature
FYECO:0000006.def: The experiment was performed, or cells were grown, at a low temperature (typically lower than ~25 degrees Celsius).

name: overexpression
overexpression
FYECO:0000007.def: The expression level of the gene was increased compared to expressing it from its endogenous promoter in the genome.

name: knockdown
knockdown
FYECO:0000008.def: The expression level of the gene was decreased compared to expressing it from its endogenous promoter in the genome.

name: grouping growth medium
group growth medium
FYECO:0000009.def: Any experimental condition pertaining to the medium in which cells are grown.

name: absence of chemical
absence of chemical
FYECO:0000010.def: The experimental conditions included the absence of a chemical.

name: grouping limited
grouping limit
FYECO:0000011.def: Any experimental condition pertaining to the presence of one or more substances in a limited amount.

name: grouping defined medium
group define medium
FYECO:0000013.def: Any experimental condition that describes a defined growth medium, i.e. one in which all constituent substances and their concentrations are known.

name: sporulation medium
sporulation medium
FYECO:0000015.def: Experiments were performed in defined medium promoting mating and sporulation.

name: high glucose mm
high glucose mm
FYECO:0000016.def: Experiments were performed in minimal medium containing a high concentration of glucose (~5-8% typically) as carbon source, salts and water.

name: + limited adenine

FYECO:0000021.def: An experimental condition in which adenine was added to the medium or assay buffers in a limiting quantity compared to standard medium or assay buffers.

name: absence of p - factor
absence of p - factor
FYECO:0000022.def: P-factor, the mating pheromone secreted by P-cells, was absent from the experiment.

name: presence of 3',5 ' - cyclic amp
presence of 3',5 ' - cyclic amp
FYECO:0000023.def: Experiments were performed in the presence of cAMP. Presence can either imply exogenous addition of the chemical or the action of adenylate cyclase.

name: + sugar
+ sugar
FYECO:0000024.def: An experimental condition in which a sugar was added to the medium or assay buffer in excess compared to standard medium or assay buffers.

name: + sorbitol

name: absence of 3 ' 5 ' - cyclic amp

name: grouping sequential growth conditions

name: 24 - 48h nitrogen starvation followed by 4 - 7 day recovery in rich medium
24 - 48h nitrogen starvation follow by 4 - 7 day recovery in rich medium
FYECO:0000095.def: Recovery from nitrogen starvation: cells are first grown in minimal medium containing no nitrogen for 24-48h. This medium is then replaced with rich medium containing nitrogen and cells allowed to grow for 4-7 days.

name: 24 - 48h nitrogen starvation followed by 5 - 12h recovery in rich medium
24 - 48h nitrogen starvation follow by 5 - 12h recovery in rich medium
FYECO:0000096.def: Recovery from nitrogen starvation: cells are first grown in minimal medium containing no nitrogen for 24-48h. This medium is then replaced with nitrogen containing rich medium and cells are allowed to grow for 5-12h.

name: 24 - 48h nitrogen starvation followed by 12 - 24h recovery in rich medium
24 - 48h nitrogen starvation follow by 12 - 24h recovery in rich medium
FYECO:0000097.def: Recovery from nitrogen starvation: cells are first grown in minimal medium containing no nitrogen for 24-48h. This medium is then replaced with nitrogen containing rich medium and cells are allowed to grow for 12-24h.

name: 72h - 7days nitrogen starvation followed by 12 - 24h recovery in rich medium
72h - 7days nitrogen starvation follow by 12 - 24h recovery in rich medium
FYECO:0000098.def: Recovery from nitrogen starvation: cells are first grown in minimal medium containing no nitrogen for 72h-7days. This medium is then replaced with nitrogen containing rich medium and cells are allowed to grow for 12-24h.

name: 72h - 7days nitrogen starvation followed by 4 - 7 days recovery in rich medium

FYECO:0000099.def: Recovery from nitrogen starvation: cells are first grown in minimal medium containing no nitrogen for 72h-7days. This medium is then replaced with nitrogen containing rich medium and cells are allowed to grow for 4-7 days.

heat shock for 20 - 30 min at 48 degree c , preceeded and follow by growth at normal temperature

name: ph
ph

name: anaerobic environment

name: raffinose ye

name: yes
yes

nonfermentable glycerol and ethanol rich medium

name: in vitro
in vitro

name: in vivo
in vivo

name: + ade
+ ade
